My Top Films of 1968

1. Once Upon a Time in the West (Sergio Leone)
2. Yellow Submarine (George Dunning)
3. The Lion In Winter (Anthony Harvey)
4. Night of the Living Dead (George A. Romero)
5. Targets (Peter Bogdanovich)
6. 2001: A Space Odyssey (Stanley Kubrick)

@alexcowan2 My favorites are Magnificent Seven (1960), Treasure of the Sierra Madre (1948), & Tombstone (1993). I'd also recommend Shane, True Grit (1969 gets you some John Wayne, but 2010's is excellent too), Once Upon a Time in the West, The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, & Unforgiven.

All of the Spaghetti Westerns were amazing, with THTBTU and Once Upon a Time in the West at the top of that list. Unforgiven also deserves to be here.
